mapper.sql: IN_LOG_ID, LOG_TYPE, YEAR_MONTH_DAY, `YEAR_MONTH`, WAREHOUSE_LOG_ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ASS_ORDER_NO, REMARK, DELIVERY_DIRECT, ADD_TIME, VALID_TIME, TRADER_NAME, TRADER_ID, TRADER_LEVEL, CUSTOMER_TYPE, CUSTOMER_NATURE, ORG_NAME, INVOICE_TYPE, REGION_NAME, SKU_NAME, SKU, BRAND_NAME, MODEL, UNIT_NAME, THREE_FL, TWO_FL, ONE_FL, OLD_THREE_FL, OLD_TWO_FL, OLD_ONE_FL, BARCODE, BARCODE_FACTORY, NUM, NEW_COST_PRICE, TOTAL_AMOUNT, BATCH_NUMBER, DATE_FORMAT(LOG_ADD_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') LOG_ADD_TIME

IN_LOG_ID, LOG_TYPE, YEAR_MONTH_DAY, `YEAR_MONTH`, WAREHOUSE_LOG_ID, ORDER_NO, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ASS_ORDER_NO, REMARK, DELIVERY_DIRECT, ADD_TIME, VALID_TIME, TRADER_NAME, TRADER_ID, TRADER_LEVEL, CUSTOMER_TYPE, CUSTOMER_NATURE, ORG_NAME, INVOICE_TYPE, REGION_NAME, SKU_NAME, SKU, BRAND_NAME, MODEL, UNIT_NAME, THREE_FL, TWO_FL, ONE_FL, OLD_THREE_FL, OLD_TWO_FL, OLD_ONE_FL, BARCODE, BARCODE_FACTORY, NUM, NEW_COST_PRICE, TOTAL_AMOUNT, BATCH_NUMBER, DATE_FORMAT(LOG_ADD_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') LOG_ADD_TIME

mapper.update:
update V_LOG_DATA
LOG_TYPE = #{logType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
YEAR_MONTH_DAY = #{yearMonthDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YEAR_MONTH = #{yearMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAREHOUSE_LOG_ID = #{warehouseLogId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASS_ORDER_NO = #{assOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELIVERY_DIRECT = #{deliveryDirect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VALID_TIME = #{validTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TRADER_NAME = #{traderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADER_ID = #{traderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TRADER_LEVEL = #{traderLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_TYPE = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_NATURE = #{customerNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_TYPE = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGION_NAME = #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKU_NAME = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRAND_NAME = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_NAME = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THREE_FL = #{threeFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TWO_FL = #{twoFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONE_FL = #{oneFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_THREE_FL = #{oldThreeFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_TWO_FL = #{oldTwoFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_ONE_FL = #{oldOneFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BARCODE = #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BARCODE_FACTORY = #{barcodeFactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUM = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NEW_COST_PRICE = #{newCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BATCH_NUMBER = #{batchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOG_ADD_TIME = #{logAddTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where IN_LOG_ID = #{inLogId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update V_LOG_DATA set LOG_TYPE = #{logType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, YEAR_MONTH_DAY = #{yearMonthDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YEAR_MONTH = #{yearMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_LOG_ID = #{warehouseLogId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TYPE = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASS_ORDER_NO = #{assOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVERY_DIRECT = #{deliveryDirect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VALID_TIME = #{validTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TRADER_NAME = #{traderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADER_ID = #{traderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRADER_LEVEL = #{traderLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_TYPE = #{customerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_NATURE = #{customerNature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_TYPE = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION_NAME = #{regionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKU_NAME = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_NAME = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_NAME = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THREE_FL = #{threeFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TWO_FL = #{twoFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ONE_FL = #{oneFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_THREE_FL = #{oldThreeFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_TWO_FL = #{oldTwoFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_ONE_FL = #{oldOneFl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BARCODE = #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BARCODE_FACTORY = #{barcodeFactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUM = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NEW_COST_PRICE = #{newCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BATCH_NUMBER = #{batchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOG_ADD_TIME = #{logAddTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where IN_LOG_ID = #{inLogId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM V_LOG_DATA A WHERE A.YEAR_MONTH = #{dateStr} AND (A.LOG_TYPE = 0 OR ( A.LOG_TYPE =1 AND A.ORDER_TYPE IN ('采购退货出库','采购换货出库') )) -- AND A.LOG_TYPE = 0 AND A.IS_DELETE = 0

SELECT
FROM V_LOG_DATA A WHERE A.YEAR_MONTH = #{dateStr} AND A.LOG_TYPE = 1 AND A.ORDER_TYPE NOT IN ('采购退货出库','采购换货出库') AND A.IS_DELETE = 0
SELECT * FROM V_LOG_DATA A WHERE A.ORDER_TYPE IN ( '报废出库', '盘盈入库', '调整盘亏出库', '调整盘盈入库', '销售出库', '销售换货出库' ) AND A.IS_DELETE = 0
SELECT * FROM V_LOG_DATA A WHERE A.ORDER_TYPE IN ( '销售换货入库','销售退货入库' ) AND A.IS_DELETE = 0 AND A.DELIVERY_DIRECT='否'

SELECT A.ORDER_NO, A.SKU, A.`YEAR_MONTH`, SUM( A.NUM ) NUM, SUM( A.TOTAL_AMOUNT ) TOTAL_AMOUNT, SUM( A.TOTAL_AMOUNT ) / SUM( A.NUM ) NEW_COST_PRICE FROM V_LOG_DATA A WHERE A.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND A.LOG_TYPE = 1 AND A.SKU = #{sku} AND A.IS_DELETE = 0 GROUP BY A.ORDER_NO,A.`YEAR_MONTH`,A.SKU ORDER BY A.`YEAR_MONTH` ASC

SELECT
FROM V_LOG_DATA A WHERE A.SKU = #{sku} AND A.LOG_TYPE = 0 AND A.IS_DELETE = 0

SELECT
FROM V_LOG_DATA A WHERE A.SKU = #{sku} AND A.LOG_TYPE = 1 AND A.IS_DELETE = 0
